title: Strengthening Curriculum Development Practical Competencies: Short-Term Mobile-Based Chemistry Experiment Core Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain the procedures of five basic chemistry experiments (titration, separation, synthesis, etc.) via mobile modules.
Learners can identify and correct three or more error cases that may occur during experimental processes using simulation and video materials.
Learners can solve experimental calculation problems (e.g., concentration calculations, stoichiometric calculations) with 80% or higher accuracy through weekly quizzes (formative assessments).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
